subject: RE: [junit] Testing GUIs - mouse clicks, list selections, and other user inputs
msgSnippet: ... There is an article about GUI testing at www.junit.org search (sourceforge or the web) for jfcunit Bernd
messageBody:
> If there's a book or two on the subject that would be ideal. If not, how
> about some web sites with tutorials.

There is an article about GUI testing at www.junit.org
search (sourceforge or the web) for jfcunit

Bernd
